spatial_context.purpose: Centralized backup storage for all AIOS workspace backup files

file_operations: This folder is designated for backup file storage only
Backup files should be created here, not in workspace root or subdirectories
Regular cleanup of old backups is encouraged
folder_operations: Do not create subdirectories in backups folder
Backup files older than 30 days can be archived or removed
Critical backups should be clearly marked in filename
ai_guidance.consciousness_notes: Low consciousness level - mechanical backup storage, no active intelligence needed
